channel.title: dj is cooking with gas on courtside nyc
channel.description: Recent content in dj is cooking with gas on courtside nyc

item.title: eavesdrop
item.description: thoughts def need a res food surprisingly good menu highlights cold sesame noodles

item.title: llama inn
item.description: thoughts easy to get a res menu highlights snow peas lamb sausage

item.title: the commodore ii
item.description: thoughts if i lived closer would be a local haunt menu highlights comfort food is king (entire menu is fire)

item.title: cervo's
item.description: thoughts everything is good, not a single miss

item.title: tatiana by kwame onwuachi
item.description: thoughts walk into lincoln center, it’s on the right menu highlights everything we ate was insanely good my two favorites were the egusi dumplings & the short rib pastrami suya
menu highlights popcorn chicken black pepper beef

item.title: madeline's martini
item.description: thoughts great date spot menu highlights french martini

item.title: 11 tigers
item.description: thoughts chaotic but wasn’t mad about it, fit the vibe

item.title: mono + mono
item.description: thoughts also a going out spot - come for a late dinner and stay! dj spins late night. beautiful on the inside. plants everywhere, behing the bar is filled with fermenting jars of soju, walls are covered in records. menu highlights fried chicken is gas

item.title: rule of thirds
item.description: thoughts had my company holiday party here and it was a huge hit, also surprisingly affordable for 35 people. menu highlights duck fried chicken rice cooker pudding - not for everyone but i loved it.

item.title: the izakaya
item.description: thoughts two locations. original is on 6th and newer is on 4th menu highlights kastu sandwich usually sells out, people line up for it
